title: Upload
brief_description: In 2033, people who are near death can be uploaded into VR hotels run by tech firms. Cash-strapped Nora lives in Brooklyn and works customer service for the Lakeview digital afterlife. When party-boy Nathan is in a car crash, his girlfriend uploads him into Nora’s VR world.

constellations_other.name: VR dreams
constellations_other.description: Since VR's inception creators have explored the ways VR could be used to enhance our lives and even extend them.

description: In 2033, people who are near death can be “uploaded” into virtual reality hotels run by 6 tech firms. Cash-strapped Nora lives in Brooklyn and works customer service for the luxurious “Lakeview” digital afterlife. When L.A. party-boy/coder Nathan’s self-driving car crashes, his high-maintenance girlfriend uploads him permanently into Nora’s VR world.
